sentences.sContent: The bass guitar began to thump so loudly that it resonated in my head.
sentences.sCn: 低音吉他开始砰然作响，震得我的脑袋嗡嗡的。

remMethod.val: re (回) + son (声音) + ate (使…) → 使产生回声 → 使共鸣

words.tran: [声] 共鸣器，共鸣体；共振器
产生共鸣；回响（resonate 的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: if something such as an event or a message resonates, it seems important or good to people, or continues to do this
